original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: Trump suggests one-on-one Russia-Ukraine meeting before potential peace summit, as both leaders have met separately with him. The US President believes this could lead to a lasting peace without a ceasefire first. Meanwhile, the US plan to build a naval drone fleet to counter China faces technical issues and management turmoil, according to Reuters.</s>
